original_title: Inner Wheel Club Colombo Mid Town District 322- 45th President installation
original_body_lines: Installation ceremony of the 45th President of the Inner Wheel Club of Colombo Mid Town District 322 was held on July 6th at the Automobile Association of Ceylon auditorium.
District chairperson Ms. Upeka Peiris was the Chief Guest and the ceremony was well attended by club members.

The highlights of the past year were presented by the President Ms. Jayanthi Vinodhan. Special message of Charter Member Ms. Sunethra Samaranayake was delivered by Ms. Shazna Thassim. The vote of thanks was proposed by Ms. Jayanthi Hapugoda.

Dhammika Attygalle, President of the Automobile Association of Ceylon (AAC), handed over a cheque as a donation to the incoming President Faahima Macan Markar towards refurbishing the Cancer Ward at the Karapitiya Hospital.
